Author: Una
Name: Umbra XIV
Punchline: Adds fully customizable toolbars and 3D world markers to the game.
Description: Consolidates common UI elements and actions into a single uniform interface in the form of a set of highly customizable toolbars.
Changelog:
# Umbra 3.1.7

## Fixes & Improvements

- Added two new customizable theme colors for tooltips. (By [alexpado](https://github.com/alexpado)).
- Fixed an issue where hunt world markers were not always being visible when there are multiples of the same type on the map. (By [alexpado](https://github.com/alexpado)).
- Fixed various UI issues related to scrollbar colors not respecting the theme. (By [alexpado](https://github.com/alexpado)).
- Fixed an issue in data migration on profiles with no widgets. (By [alexpado](https://github.com/alexpado)).
- Fixed an issue in the Volume Widget where changes made in the UI settings were not persisted in presets. (By [alexpado](https://github.com/alexpado)).

---
